data.text: @kirkkorner Unbelievable, shame the Police seem to choose vulnerable people who they know can’t fight back.
@kirkkorner I don't understand why anyone would plead guilty.

@kirkkorner @ToniaBuxton He should have said he was holding a party, with a 'silver tray' policy, in lieu of 'BYO'. After all, if it's fit for our Prime Minister to get away with breaking his own rules, surely it's fine for a beggar to do what a beggar actually does. Would be great if the PM actually did
@tom28542744 @kirkkorner @markbutcher72 This country is lawless if you're rich or Russian or both...#JohnsonOut38

@kirkkorner @mgt_coull26 What a heartless prick! The courts are as bad if not worse....and yet BJ & Co partied their way through lockdown and they get a questionnaire.....what happened to justice? Another corrupt judge to go with a corrupt met police force and a corrupt beyond belief government..
@kirkkorner There must have been other people around or else his begging would have been pointless. I wonder if they were also fined for breaking covid rules?
@kirkkorner The date on that report is January 27th, 2021... And mentions no amount he was fined or told to pay. 🤷🏻‍♀️
@kirkkorner Have a word with Boris - he might be able to help.
